DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate SUN11031 for injection compared to placebo in subjects with cachexia associated with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) to determine the effect on physical performance and body composition.
DOC.brief_title: SUN11031 in Cachexia Associated With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
DOC.criteria: Male or nonpregnant female subjects ≥50 years of age with a clinical diagnosis of COPD Loss >5% of subject's usual body weight Severe anemia (hemoglobin ≤8 g/dL) COPD exacerbation Currently undergoing treatment or evaluation for cancer Type I or type II diabetes mellitus or a fasting serum glucose of ≥115 mg/dL
DOC.keyword: Cachexia, COPD, Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
